濅字的基本解释

濅
jìn
古同“浸”。

濅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》子鴆切，去沁，精。］
“浸1”的古字。
逐渐。

濅字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濅； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页654第24
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?子鴆切，音祲。水名。【說文】水出魏郡武安東。　又一州大瀦曰濅。【前漢·地理志】揚州川曰三江，濅曰五湖。【註】濅，古浸字。　又水漬也。詳浸字註。　又益也，漸也。【前漢·成帝紀】濅以成俗。　又【集韻】【韻會】子朕切【正韻】子袵切，?音䤐。濅丘，縣名。見【前漢·地理志】。

濅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
濅字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Ziyun cut, go to Qin, fine. ]
The ancient word for "leaching 1".
gradually.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Yi; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 654 24
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Zi-dun cut, sound. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Wu Andong, Wei County.　Another Zhou Dazhu said Yi. [Pre-Han·Geography] Yangzhou Chuan is called Sanjiang, and Yi is called Five Lakes. [Note] 濅, ancient immersion word.　It's also water-stained. Detailed note of the word immersion.　It's also benefit, gradually. 【Former Han·Chengdi Ji】Supplement to become commonplace.　 [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zi Zhen Qi [Zheng Yun] Zi Qi Qi,? Yin Wa. Yiqiu, the county name. See [Former Han Geography].
